entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@AP @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse 

Everything is about Trump -- even the 4th of July -- he wants to celebrate so he can forget about Americans sick and dying from COVID-19 -- that's part of his election strategy: Not giving a damn about the families who lost loved ones to the disease
